original_text: And they went up on the breadth of the earth, and compassed the camp of the saints about, and the beloved city: and fire came down from God out of heaven, and devoured them.
korean_text: 그들이 지면에 널리 퍼져 성도들의 진과 사랑하시는 성을 두르매 하늘에서 불이 내려와 그들을 태워버리고

sentences.original_text: And they went up on the breadth of the earth
and compassed the camp of the saints about
and fire came down from God out of heaven
